com.hazelcast.client.impl.protocol.util

Class UnsafeBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.client.impl.protocol.util.UnsafeBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientProtocolBuffer

    public class UnsafeBuffer
extends Object
implements ClientProtocolBuffer
    Supports regular, byte ordered, access to an underlying buffer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnsafeBuffer(byte[] buffer)
      Attach a view to a byte[] for providing direct access.

      • putStringUtf8

                String value,
                int maxEncodedSize)
        Description copied from interface: ClientProtocolBuffer
        Encode a String as UTF-8 bytes the buffer with a length prefix with a maximum encoded size check.
        Specified by:
        putStringUtf8 in interface ClientProtocolBuffer
        Parameters:

        value - The value of the String to be encoded.
        maxEncodedSize - The maximum encoded size to be checked before writing to the buffer.
